title.narrative: 2014 MATERNAL AND NEONATAL HEALTH

description.narrative: By 2018, 80% of deliveries take place in a health facility in at least 5 provinces., which contributes to Adolescent Health And Nutrition, Child Health, Hiv Prevention, Maternal And Newborn Health, Pmtct And Infant Male Circumcision. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 2010-2018 - Outcome 2 / Health&Nutrition: By 2018, children and women benefit from prevention of chronic malnutrition through an integrated health and nutrition package, maternal and neonatal health and child survival.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2018, 80% of deliveries take place in a health facility in at least 5 provinces.

description.narrative: By the end of 2018, eight pregnant women out of ten gave birth with a skilled health provider. UNICEF equipped three centres for pre-service training on maternal and newborn care and strengthened the prevention of mother-to-child transmission programme contributing to a reduced transmission rate. | Status:Partially Met | As-of Date:31/12/2018
